testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on HRMLogin page "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/".passed When User enters username as "Admin" and password as "admin123".............passed Then User should be able to login sucessfully and new page open.............passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on HRMLogin page "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/".passed When User enters username as "" and password as "abc".......................passed Then User should be able to see error message "Required"....................passed
